physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a group of people. They are all standing, except for an infant who is being carried, and looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. Three children and an infant are present, together with two ladies and three men. They are standing in front of a building, on a grass patch.
title_text: A group of people outside a house Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: group portraits children (people by age group) adults
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Portraits, Group Children and adults
